name: Why Can't I Hold All These Upgrades!?
name_original: Why Can't I Hold All These Upgrades!?
description:
Why Can't I Hold All These UPGRADES!? Is a Metroidvania game where you can't hold multiple upgrades at once- hence the name. 

Created by Naomi and Tim Hely for the GMTK Game Jam of 2018.

Play in your browser (Flash) or download the Windows version.

Move with Arrow Keys, C to Jump, X to Shoot, Up to Enter Doors.

+/- to Adjust Sound, 0 to Toggle Mute.

The Developers

Naomi (11): Art, Level Design, Sound Design

Tim (>11): Code
